worldbank 0.0.1
  • Reference

    World Bank topic data

    wb_topic.Rd

    List all topics supported by the World Bank API.

    wb_topic(topic = "all", lang = "en")

    Source

    http://api.worldbank.org/v2/topics

    Arguments

    topic

    character(1) topic to query. Default is "all".

    lang

    character(1) language to query. Default is "en".

    Value

    A data.frame with the available topics. The columns are:

    id

    The topic ID.

    value

    The topic value.

    source_note

    The source note.

    Examples

    wb_topic()
#> # A tibble: 21 × 3
#>       id value                           source_note

#>  8     8 Health                          "Improving health is central to the Mi…
#>  9     9 Infrastructure                  "Infrastructure helps determine the su…
#> 10    10 Social Protection & Labor       "The supply of labor available in an e…
#> # ℹ 11 more rows
